body:
image_path returns full urls if you have asset hosts enabled (modulo the protocol, depending on the value of default_asset_host_protocol).

There's probably some IE quirk that I'm missing, but I'm still not following what you're getting at.  If I visit https://audioboo.fm/login in IE8, I don't get that  "page contains both secure and nonsecure" warning.   It has default_asset_host_protocol=nil, so the logo in the top right has an absolute url (https://d15mj6e6qmt1na.cloudfront.net/assets/logoWhite-1934fbb9fb8a70e36c1e9bb903b3b328.png) rather than a protocol-relative url (//d15mj6e6qmt1na.cloudfront.net/assets/logoWhite-1934fbb9fb8a70e36c1e9bb903b3b328.png).
